column5: Just got back from Canadian Tire on my lunch.... went there cause I saw some "trilene" in the flyer on sale. Walked down the fishin isle to find Power pro on sale for $14.99..... I picked up a spool of 50# and 40# I just left BPS on friday night n Vaughn and the same spool of 50# I paid I think $21 for !
Wow ,,,  Thanks for the heads up.. I'll head over there right now and pick some up   :worthy:
they ahve them on special every once in a while.  I usually pick up 10-12 spools when they do.  I'll go check.
Tuf-Line XP  Alot of tackle shops sell it in bulk for $0.08/M.  Almost exact same Spectra braid as PP, and $0.02/M cheaper than that "deal".

I was @ LeBaron in Mississauga last night.... They had a sale on Power Pro as well....I believe it was $14.99.... They're also having a sale on Braid by Stren (Sinking Braid) for $13.99......  http://lebaron.ca/pdf_files_sp09/specials/...ials_page_f.pdf
